name: The celestial flail, 'Dawnstar' (1h)
data: It increases hit chance a tiny bit.
It has tremendous weapon class for its type (decent in general).
It increases the users strength adequately.
It increases the users wisdom adequately.
It increases the users magical resistance somewhat.
It does fire damage unbelievably much.
This item loses its magical powers extremely slowly.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'holy might'.
It increases the users fire resistance strongly.
The flail, Dawnstar, is a bane of the undead.
If used to smite the undead with skills, its divine power will leap forth to burn them.
